properties.title: Woodhouse hill community club (formally the peggy tub)

properties.accessibility:
The building has level access suitable for wheelchair users.
There is a disabled toilet.
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits you at our Warm Space with free hot or cold drinks, soup and roll for lunch, people to chat to and books, jigsaws & board games available.
properties.title: Greenside Methodist Church

properties.accessibility:
The venue is Wheelchair accessible. There’s a Car park with accessible parking
Accessible toilets and baby change facilities
We’re dementia friendly
properties.description:
Pop in for a cuppa, a selection of homemade cookies and a friendly chat in our warm space. (Pay as you feel)
Access to free WI-FI
A small library
properties.title: Wigton Moor Church

properties.accessibility: Warm space is located on the ground floor and accessible. Parking on Coronation Parade.
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits you at Community Hubs / libraries across Leeds. Here you can read, play games, use our free computers and wi-fi, enjoy a variety of activities, or simply sit and relax for a while.
properties.title: Halton Moor and Osmondthorpe Project for Elders (HOPE)

properties.accessibility: Level access to main door and Warm Space area. On road parking only.
properties.address: St Peter's Church, Rooms Lane, Morley
properties.description: Free Wi-Fi available on request; hot drinks, cold drinks and cakes/biscuits available on a 'pay as you feel' basis; baby changing facilities available; toys and high-chairs available for babies and toddlers.
properties.title: St Peter's Morley

properties.accessibility: Our entrance is fully accessible. Accessible parking is possible by prior agreement only. Our toilets are fully accessible.
properties.description: Free hot drinks are available and donations are welcome. Free WiFi is available. Limited charging is available. Games and Jigsaws are available.
properties.title: Leeds Minster
